name: Red Pill (itch) (Implicit Gaming)
description:
Red Pill

Set in the modern world with winks towards 1940's, Red Pill will take you on a journey to discover the meaning behind meaningless choices.

Join Charlotte or Yugi and choose your way into their hearts and beds or towards your untimely demise.

Your story will begin with the most common decision of what to wear this morning and will unfold to 32 different story endings. And one special ending.
